snippet.title: Tetris Effect: Connected Launch Trailer | Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Windows PC
snippet.description:
Tetris® Effect: Connected is now available on Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Windows 10 PC (Microsoft Store), and Game Pass! Find other players: https://discord.gg/enhance

The game leverages Smart Delivery allowing access to both the Xbox One title and the Xbox Series X|S title.

In Summer 2021, the multiplayer expansion will be made available as a free update to all other existing versions of Tetris Effect (PS4, Epic Games Store, Oculus Quest).

Tetris Effect: Connected is the original Tetris Effect with all-new co-op and competitive online and local multiplayer modes! This is Tetris® like you’ve never seen it, or heard it, or felt it before—an incredibly addictive, unique, and breathtakingly gorgeous reinvention of one of the most popular puzzle games of all time.

Buy Tetris Effect: Connected: https://www.tetriseffect.game/buy

Follow Enhance:
http://twitter.com/enhance_exp
http://instagram.com/enhance_experience

#TetrisEffect #TetrisEffectConnected #tetris #xbox #xboxone #xboxseriesx #xboxseriess #windows10 #pcgaming #pcgames #gametrailers #puzzlegame #multiplayer #multiplayergames
